docs.text: Weapon usage trends v1 Calculations are based on kill count which is biased towards those getting more kills. Other guns like m79 might be discounted here while they have more utility (ie boost) besides getting kills. Data summary .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type { vertical-align: middle; } .dataframe tbody tr th { vertical-align: top; } .dataframe thead th { text-align: right; } first_game_start_time last_game_start_time games_count 0 2022-12-01 19:27:20 2023-02-01 23:04:25 742 .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type { vertical-align: middle; } .dataframe tbody tr th { vertical-align: top; } .dataframe thead th { text-align: right; } playlistCode games_count 0 CTF-Standard-4 23 1 CTF-Standard-6 716 2 CTF-Standard-8 3 Weapon usage trends Chart data: csv Chart data: csv Kill counts in last 7 days

docs.text: Calculations are based on kill count which is biased towards those getting more kills. Other guns like m79 might be discounted here while they have more utility (ie boost) besides getting kills.

docs.title: Weapon usage trends

docs.text: Weapon usage trends v2 Calculations of weapon usage are based on weapon_kills/all_kills ratio for each player and round as suggested by Fri . With this approach weapons that are getting less kills but more caps (eg m79) are treated more fairly compared to those that are good at getting high kill count (eg mp5, rheinmetall). Data summary .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type { vertical-align: middle; } .dataframe tbody tr th { vertical-align: top; } .dataframe thead th { text-align: right; } first_game last_game games_count 0 2022-11-04 18:42:40 2023-02-01 23:04:25 1192 .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type { vertical-align: middle; } .dataframe tbody tr th { vertical-align: top; } .dataframe thead th { text-align: right; } playlistCode games_count 0 CTF-Standard-4 62 1 CTF-Standard-6 1123 2 CTF-Standard-8 7 Primary weapons Chart data: csv Chart data: csv Secondary weapons Chart data: csv Chart data: csv
docs.title: Weapon usage trends v2

docs.text: Calculations of weapon usage are based on weapon_kills/all_kills ratio for each player and round as suggested by Fri . With this approach weapons that are getting less kills but more caps (eg m79) are treated more fairly compared to those that are good at getting high kill count (eg mp5, rheinmetall).
docs.title: Weapon usage trends v2
